java/liquibase/database/sql/UpdateStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 
00005 import java.util.*;
00006 
00007 public class UpdateStatement implements SqlStatement {
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String tableName;
00010     private Map<String, Object> newColumnValues = new HashMap<String, Object>();
00011     private String whereClause;
00012     private List<Object> whereParameters = new ArrayList<Object>();
00013 
00014 
00015     public UpdateStatement(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00016         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00017         this.tableName = tableName;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getSchemaName() {
00021         return schemaName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getTableName() {
00025         return tableName;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public UpdateStatement addNewColumnValue(String columnName, Object newValue) {
00029         newColumnValues.put(columnName, newValue);
00030 
00031         return this;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public String getWhereClause() {
00035         return whereClause;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public UpdateStatement setWhereClause(String whereClause) {
00039         this.whereClause = whereClause;
00040 
00041         return this;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void addWhereParameter(Object value) {
00045         this.whereParameters.add(value);
00046     }
00047 
00048 
00049     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00050         return true;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public Map<String, Object> getNewColumnValues() {
00054         return newColumnValues;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) {
00058         StringBuffer sql = new StringBuffer("UPDATE "+database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName())+" SET");
00059         for (String column : newColumnValues.keySet()) {
00060             sql.append(" ").append(database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), column)).append(" = ");
00061             sql.append(convertToString(newColumnValues.get(column), database));
00062             sql.append(",");
00063         }
00064 
00065         sql.deleteCharAt(sql.lastIndexOf(","));
00066         if (whereClause != null) {
00067             String fixedWhereClause = "WHERE "+whereClause;
00068             for (Object param : whereParameters) {
00069                 fixedWhereClause = fixedWhereClause.replaceFirst("\\?", convertToString(param, database));
00070             }
00071             sql.append(" ").append(fixedWhereClause);
00072         }
00073 
00074         return sql.toString();
00075     }
00076 
00077     private String convertToString(Object newValue, Database database) {
00078         String sqlString;
00079         if (newValue == null || newValue.toString().equalsIgnoreCase("NULL")) {
00080             sqlString = "NULL";
00081         } else if (newValue instanceof String && database.shouldQuoteValue(((String) newValue))) {
00082             sqlString = "'" + newValue + "'";
00083         } else if (newValue instanceof Date) {
00084             sqlString = database.getDateLiteral(((Date) newValue));
00085         } else if (newValue instanceof Boolean) {
00086             if (((Boolean) newValue)) {
00087                 sqlString = database.getTrueBooleanValue();
00088             } else {
00089                 sqlString = database.getFalseBooleanValue();
00090             }
00091         } else {
00092             sqlString = newValue.toString();
00093         }
00094         return sqlString;
00095     }
00096 
00097     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00098         return ";";
00099     }
00100 }
